mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JAMES_USER (USER_NAME, PASSWORD_HASH_ALGORITHM, PASSWORD, VERSION) VALUES (#{email}, 'NONE', #{password}, 1)
INSERT INTO MAIL (MAIL_NO, EMP_NO, SENDER, SUBJECT, MAIL_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, SEND_STATUS, TAG_NO) VALUES (MAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{from}, #{subject}, #{mailContent}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0)
INSERT INTO RECEIVERS (REC_EMP_NO, MAIL_NO, READ_CHECK, DELETE_CHECK, RECEIVE_TYPE) VALUES (#{empNo}, MAIL_SEQ.CURRVAL, 'N', 'N', #{receiveType})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT M.MAIL_NO, M.EMP_NO, M.SENDER, M.SUBJECT, M.MAIL_CONTENT, M.SEND_DATE, M.SEND_STATUS, M.TAG_NO, R.READ_CHECK, R.DELETE_CHECK, R.REC_EMP_NO FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN RECEIVERS R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'To' OR R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'cc' OR R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'send' ) A WHERE A.DELETE_CHECK = #{deleteCheck} AND A.REC_EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT B.MAIL_NO, B.EMP_NO, B.SENDER, B.SUBJECT, B.MAIL_CONTENT, B.SEND_DATE, B.SEND_STATUS, B.TAG_NO, B.READ_CHECK, B.DELETE_CHECK, B.RECEIVE_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SEND_DATE DESC) AS RN, A.MAIL_NO, A.EMP_NO, A.SENDER, A.SUBJECT, A.MAIL_CONTENT, A.SEND_DATE, A.SEND_STATUS, A.TAG_NO, A.READ_CHECK, A.DELETE_CHECK, A.RECEIVE_TYPE FROM (SELECT M.MAIL_NO, M.EMP_NO, M.SENDER, M.SUBJECT, M.MAIL_CONTENT, M.SEND_DATE, M.SEND_STATUS, M.TAG_NO, R.READ_CHECK, R.DELETE_CHECK, R.REC_EMP_NO, R.RECEIVE_TYPE FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN RECEIVERS R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'To' OR R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'cc' OR R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'send') A WHERE A.DELETE_CHECK = #{deleteCheck} AND A.REC_EMP_NO = #{empNo}) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN RECEIVERS R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.DELETE_CHECK = #{deleteCheck} AND R.READ_CHECK = 'N' AND R.REC_EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'To' OR R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'cc'
SELECT REC_EMP_NO, MAIL_NO, READ_CHECK, DELETE_CHECK, RECEIVE_TYPE FROM RECEIVERS WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND RECEIVE_TYPE = 'To' OR RECEIVE_TYPE = 'cc'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN RECEIVERS R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.DELETE_CHECK = 'N' AND R.READ_CHECK = 'N' AND R.RECEIVE_TYPE = 'send' AND R.REC_EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT REC_EMP_NO FROM RECEIVERS WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND RECEIVE_TYPE = 'To'
